ISSUE.TITLE: [Monorepo Detection] Add workspace-managers.ts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This file will mimic the structure of `vercel/frameworks/frameworks.ts` in the sense that it defines the list of supported workspace managers. These are the ones were targeting for the initial launch, * Yarnv1 * NPM * PNPM
